title: Dual approaches in pharmacogenetics: Developing PCR-SSP and RT-PCR methods for HLA-B*13:01 screening to prevent dapsone and Co-trimoxazole SCARs
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Jirapat Attapong, Chollanot Kaset, Nontaya Nakkam, Wichittra Tassaneeyakul, Nuanjun Wichukchinda, Sirinart Chomean
